description:
Fedora Linux 41 distribution is now available for public beta testing powered by Linux kernel 6.11 and featuring the GNOME 47 desktop environment. Here's what to expect from the final release.

The post Fedora Linux 41 Enters Public Beta Testing with Linux Kernel 6.11 and GNOME 47 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fedora Linux 41 Enters Public Beta Testing with Linux Kernel 6.11 and GNOME 47
